entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending before morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 25 December 2022
